name: Detect Thoughts
description: For the duration, you sense surface thoughts of creatures within 30 feet. As an action, you can focus on one creature and probe deeper: it makes a Wisdom save; on a failure you learn its reasoning, emotional state, and what looms large in its mind; on a success the spell ends. The spell is blocked by 2 feet of rock, 2 inches of metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood/dirt.

effects.description: Read surface thoughts of creatures within 30 feet while concentrating; blocked by thick materials as noted.
Action to probe deeper into one creature; on failed Wisdom save learn reasoning, emotions, and foremost thoughts. On success, the spell ends.
